com.ibm.jaggr.core.cache

Interface ICache

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CacheImpl

    public interface ICache
extends Serializable
    The aggregator cache is the repository for cached module builds and layers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dump(Writer writer, Pattern filter)
      Outputs a string representation of this cache object.
      IGenericCache getCache(String key)
      Returns the named generic cache.
      long getCreated()
      Returns the date and time that this cache object was created.
      IGzipCache getGzipCache()
      Returns the cache of gzipped modules
      ILayerCache getLayers()
      Returns the cache of layer build cache entries.
      IModuleCache getModules()
      Returns the cache of module build cache entries
      IGenericCache putIfAbsent(String key, IGenericCache cache)
      Adds the named cache object to the Aggregator cache.
      boolean remove(String key)
      Removes the named cache object with the specified key.
      void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
      Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • getLayers

        ILayerCache getLayers()
        Returns the cache of layer build cache entries.
        Returns:
        The layer build cache entries

      • getModules

        IModuleCache getModules()
        Returns the cache of module build cache entries
        Returns:
        The module build cache entries

      • getGzipCache

        IGzipCache getGzipCache()
        Returns the cache of gzipped modules
        Returns:
        the gzip module cache

      • getCache

        IGenericCache getCache(String key)
        Returns the named generic cache. The named cache must have been added using putIfAbsent(String, IGenericCache).
        Parameters:
        key - the cache name
        Returns:
        the generic cache or null if it does not exist

      • putIfAbsent

        IGenericCache putIfAbsent(String key,
                        IGenericCache cache)
        Adds the named cache object to the Aggregator cache. Implements the same semantics as ConcurrentMap.putIfAbsent(Object, Object). Once a generic cache object is added, it persists across server restarts. When the Aggregator cache is cleared, the IGenericCache.newInstance() method is called to create a new cache object for the updated cache.
        Parameters:
        key - the cache name
        cache - the new cache object
        Returns:
        null, if an entry with the specified key did not already exist in the cache and the specified cache was added, else the previously existing entry.

      • remove

        boolean remove(String key)
        Removes the named cache object with the specified key.
        Parameters:
        key - name of the cache object to remove
        Returns:
        true if the specified cache object existed and was removed.

      • getCreated

        long getCreated()
        Returns the date and time that this cache object was created.
        Returns:
        The creation date of this cache

      • dump

        void dump(Writer writer,
        Pattern filter)
          throws IOException
        Outputs a string representation of this cache object. The filter string is just passed along to the module and layer caches and is not otherwise used by this method.
        Parameters:
        writer - The writer object to output the cache dump to
        filter - A regular expression to filter the output. Passed along to the module and layer cache object toString() methods.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • setAggregator

        void setAggregator(IAggregator aggregator)
        Called for newly created (or de-serialized) caches to set the aggregator instance for the cache. Note that the aggregator may not be fully initialized at the time that this method is called and some aggregator methods (like IAggregator.getConfig() may return null if called from within this method.
        Parameters:
        aggregator - The aggregator instance for this cache object
